resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157257</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157257</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Curriculum in Tefilla for Yeshiva Day Schools</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lehrplan in Tefilla für Yeshiva Externate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un programme d'études dans Tefilla pour des 
externats de Yeshiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um curriculum em Tefilla para escolas de dia de 
Yeshiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di studi in Tefilla per le scuole di
giorno di Yeshiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα πρόγραμμα σπουδών σε Tefilla για τα ημερήσια 
Yeshiva σχολεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de estudios en Tefilla para los 
externados de Yeshiva</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This curriculum outline for Orthodox day schools will be helpful to teachers teaching tefilla for the first time. Includes emotional, cognitive and skill goals, models for instruction, a discussion on kavanah, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tefilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Orthodox day schools</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kavanah</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lehrplanumreiß für orthodoxe Externate 
ist die Lehrer behilflich, die zum ersten Mal tefilla unterrichten. 
Enthält die emotionale, kognitive und Fähigkeit Ziele, die 
Modelle für Anweisung, eine Diskussion auf kavanah und mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce contour de programme d'études pour les 
externats orthodoxes sera utile aux professeurs enseignant le tefilla 
pour la première fois. Inclut des buts émotifs, cognitifs et 
de compétence, des modèles pour l'instruction, une discussion sur le
kavanah, et plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este esboço do curriculum para escolas de dia 
orthodox será útil aos professores que ensinam o tefilla para a 
primeira vez. Inclui objetivos emocionais, cognitive e da 
habilidade, modelos para a instrução, uma discussão no kavanah, e 
mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo profilo di programma di studi per le 
scuole di giorno ortodosse sarà utile agli insegnanti che insegnano 
per la prima volta il tefilla. Include gli obiettivi 
impressionabili, conoscitivi e di abilità, i modelli per istruzione, 
una discussione su kavanah e più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το περίγραμμα προγράμματος σπουδών για τα 
ορθόδοξα ημερήσια σχολεία θα είναι χρήσιμο στους δασκάλους που 
διδάσκουν το tefilla για πρώτη φορά. Περιλαμβάνει 
συναισθηματικό, γνωστικός και οι στόχοι ικανότητας, διαμορφώνουν 
για την οδηγία, μια συζήτηση σχετικά με το kavanah, και 
περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este contorno del plan de estudios para los 
externados ortodoxos será provechoso a los profesores que enseñan el
tefilla para la primera vez. Incluye metas emocionales, 
cognoscitivas y de la habilidad, modelos para la instrucción, una 
discusión sobre kavanah, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tefilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Orthodoxe Externate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kavanah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">programme d'études</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tefilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Externats orthodoxes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">kavanah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tefilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escolas de dia orthodox</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">kavanah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di studi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tefilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuole di giorno ortodosse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">kavanah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρόγραμμα σπουδών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">tefilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ορθόδοξα ημερήσια σχολεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">kavanah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tefilla</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Externados ortodoxos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">kavanah</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
